name: logi.
description:
* Featured by Apple New Games We Love *

Logi is an elegant, relaxing and inspiring puzzle game.
Challenge your brain with a game experience that pushes the limits of your logic.

It is enough to simply rotate objects in order to let Logi reach its goal. Yet this is not so easy! Because objects do not rotate any more after Logi takes the action.

How many steps ahead can you consider in order to let Logi reach its target?
Draw your route and let the ball reach the goal.

Game Features:
• 75 challenging sections. And more on the way...
• Relaxing music
publishers: CIZGIOFISI Bilisim ve Yayıncılık Limited Sirketi
